definition: known by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: All of this stuff is obvious and everyone knows it.
sentences.chinese: 您介绍的所有这些东西都是显而易见，尽人皆知的。

sentences.english: The tower on the hilltop is a well-known landmark.
sentences.chinese: 那山顶上的塔乃是尽人皆知的陆标。

sentences.english: Its ugly record of police brutality is known in every section of this country.
sentences.chinese: 该市警察暴行的丑恶记录全国各地尽人皆知。

sentences.english: It was common knowledge throughout the court that Leia was adopted into the Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 莱娅是王族的养女，这是宫廷中尽人皆知的事实。

sentences.english: I was quite a proverb for it at Maple Grove.
sentences.chinese: 在枫园，我的恋家是尽人皆知的。

sentences.english: They are known to be rolling in money.
sentences.chinese: 他们是尽人皆知的拥有大量钱财的人。

sentences.english: It's well-known for its fine technics and it also expresses the silversmith's unique feeling and thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 其工艺技术之美尽人皆知，表现了独特的匠意之美。

sentences.english: The story of the businessman moustache snow rock with red top is common to all.
sentences.chinese: 红顶商人胡雪岩的故事尽人皆知。

sentences.english: It is common knowledge that the traffic situation there is deplorable.
sentences.chinese: 那里的交通情况可悲可叹是尽人皆知的。

sentences.english: It id known to everyone that Mary lied about his age.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谎报年龄是尽人皆知的事实。

sentences.english: Dubai has a well-known seven-star "Burj Al Arab Hotel", Brunei it?
sentences.chinese: 迪拜有个尽人皆知的七星级“帆船酒店”，文莱呢？

definition: see 盡人皆知|尽人皆知[jin4 ren2 jie1 zhi1]
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom)/fig. a big scandal/an uproar/the talk of the town
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
